✓ BETTER VALUE: Cheaper And Better Prices Than Brand Aftermarket Pads With Top Quality, Premium Pads. Our Durable Pads Last Longer And Clean Better Than Oem Or Bulk Mop Head Replacements!

✓ EXTRA THICK Microfiber Pads For Better Absorption When Wet Mopping And Better Dust Dirt Trapping When Dry. Great For Dusting Vinyl, Hard-Wood, Tile, Laminate, And Cement! Spray Wash Or Pick Up Pet Hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than the original mophead!
reviews.reviewText: I have a Libman Freedom mop but I wasn't using it much because the mop pads were not that good at picking up the dirt. They just seemed to push around the pet hair and didn't work very well at scrubbing off sticky spots. Also, they didn't stay on the mop. Consequently, my floor often stayed dirty until I could get around to the traditional messy mop and bucket routine. (See photo with side by side comparison.) These replacement pads are great! They adhere to the mop very well and are thick and plush so they clean all the dirt with one swipe. They are a good deal wider than the mop but this gives them "flaps" that work well at wiping off the woodwork as you run the edge along a wall. So that's a bonus! They seem to clean up easily with some detergent in the sink but probably would get cleaner if tossed in the washing machine. I just got them so I haven't tried that yet. I probably wouldn't put them in the dryer though because they appear to contain a layer of foam inside which might dry out and get brittle. They came with a hand written thank you note from the seller which is always a nice touch. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and service
reviews.reviewText: Perfect fit for my Libman mop. Pads are better than those that came with the mop. The "thank you" note is a nice touch. I will hand wash, although these have machine washing instructions included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality pad for hardwood floors
reviews.reviewText: These pads are great for hardwood floors. I used them with a turbo mop … stick mop and Bruce’s hardwood floor cleaner. They absorb and leave the floors gleaming. The seller was great to work with and shipping was fast!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked like a charm
reviews.reviewText: Used as a dry dust mop on a newly installed vinal floor. Loved the quality washed beautifully and the pricing is terrific would definitely recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought these to use on our expensive mop that was given to us with only one pad. We recently got rid of most of the carpet in our house. I needed something to use on the floor and only having 1 pad to dry mop and wet mop the floors. I didn't want to spend the $ on the expensive brand refills. These work great for it! When I am done dry mopping, I use a sweeper to get all the dog hair off and then just put in the washer. I have used them several times and washed them several times and then line dry. They are holding up very well. When the time comes, I will buy more but I don't see that happening for a while.! Great replacement! Easy to clean! I am really happy with these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These mop pads are very well made. The binding around the edges covers all of the raw edges. The pads have a thin layer of foam inside (I cut them in half because they were substantially wider than my mop head) so they make good contact with the floor. The pads have stripes that are different depths to make a good scrubing surface. I will purchase these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product cleaned well and I was able to clean it easily after use!
reviews.reviewText: Ease of use and are used this to clean a hardwood floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clean the floor good
reviews.reviewText: Good absorbency, appears to be a good product. Nice price
It works good, glides on the floor which i like, and easy to wring out.

I've been looking for reusable microfiber mop pads for a while now but none are good enough. Either they leave the floor too wet, can't scrub properly or they don't polish properly. These mop pads clean well, absorb the liquid and leaves no streaks, just a shiny floor!

Bezug haftet hervorragend am Wischer. Die Microfasern reinigen schon mit Wasser so gut, dass kaum Putzmittel nötig ist. Gut auch in der Küche, da Fettspritzer vom Braten auf dem Fußboden mit einem Wisch beseitigt werden. Trocken wunderbar zwischendurch bei Hundehaaren oder Staub auf Laminat.Da macht sogar Bodenwischen Spaß: Klare Kaufempfehlung!

I’m a professional cleaner and these work better than my norwex floor system. So much easier to clean and they don’t get musty. These can take a lot of water so the trick with these is to really wring them out after getting them wet so you don’t get spots when your floor dries. I like to use a dry pad with hardwood cleaner in a spray bottle for a streak free finish. Good value also.

Le prix es juste et la vadrouille es bien adapter pour les planchers de bois franc , je doit vous parlez du manche comparer a 2 autres que j'ai eu au paravent il elle de bonne fabrication, solide, bien pensé, et se tiens bien, oui j'en fait l'éloge car plusieurs autre fabriquant font de bonne vadrouille mais on oublier qua l'occasion il faut appliquer une bonne pression sur le manche pour bien nettoyer ses planchers. Pour l'instant le velcro es bien fixer sur la plaque aluminium et les pads tienne très bien .Merci et bon succès .
